name: ICF Classification
description: Access WHO ICF (International Classification of Functioning, Disability and Health) codes. ICF complements ICD diagnosis codes by describing how health conditions affect a person's functioning in daily life - covering body functions, body structures, activities/participation, and environmental factors.

tools.name: icf_lookup
tools.description: Look up an ICF code and get its full details

tools.name: icf_search
tools.description: Search the ICF classification by keywords

tools.name: icf_browse_category
tools.description: Browse ICF categories (b, s, d, e)

tools.name: icf_get_children
tools.description: Get child codes under a parent ICF code

tools.name: icf_overview
tools.description: Get an overview of the ICF classification system
